DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluated effect of Hibiscus tea and green tea supplements on athletic performance, blood pressure, muscle damage indices and oxidative stress in male athletes 18-35 years old and cardiovascular disease prevention approach.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Hibiscus Tea and Green Tea Supplements on Athletic Performance, Blood Pressure, Muscle Damage Indices and Oxidative Stress in Male Athletes 18-35 Years Old and Cardiovascular Disease Prevention Approach
DOC.criteria: age between 18 to 35 y/o no history of smoking or alcohol consumption no taking nutritional sport supplements during the last 2 months any injury during intervention any inflammatory disease during the intervention
